term.title: radiation hazard

item.text: Hazard that exists in a region where there is a radiation field, other than what is considered to be normal background radiation.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1549 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
